objects.text:
• 925 Sterling Silver
• Pink Drop Wreath Design
• Certificate of Authenticity
• 6 Month Warranty

product_details.name: GIVA 925 Sterling Silver Rose Gold Pink Drop Wreath Studs | Gift for Girlfriend Wife Women & Girls | With Certificate of Authenticity and 925 Stamp | 6 Month Warranty*
product_details.description: Product Dimensions: 1.27 x 1.3 x 1.27 cm; 3.9 g. Item part number: ER0583. Country of Origin: India. Department: womens. Item Weight: 3.9 g. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 13 x 13 x 13 Millimeters. Net Quantity: 2.00 Count. Generic Name: Stud Earrings. Customer Reviews: 4.5 4.5 out of 5 stars 64 ratings.

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and elegant jewelry advertisement layout. It uses a light pink diagonal gradient background with soft decorative star and circle elements that subtly enhance the feminine aesthetic. At the top left corner, a bold and large heading ("heading") introduces the brand. Just below it, there’s a serif-style subheading ("subheading") displaying the product type, adding a sophisticated touch.

A thin decorative line ("decorative") sets apart the product description ("description"), which lists key features in a bullet-point format using a dark maroon shade. Below that, a striking bold price ("price") element is eye-catching and prominent. A rectangular button ("cta_background") placed underneath includes a clear call-to-action ("cta") in white uppercase text. The right side showcases a detailed image of the product ("product_image"), balanced perfectly against the text-heavy left segment.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Pink Gradient: `#F8D7DA`, `#F5C3C8`, `#F8E6E6`, `#FFF5F5`
- Accent Rose: `#E5A4A4`, `#F1A9A0`, `#F3B0B0`, `#FFC8C8`
- Text Maroon Shades: `#9D3C3C`, `#B85858`, `#7D3434`
- Call-to-Action Button: `#B85858`
- CTA Text: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image features elegant earrings with a delicate and luxurious color palette. Predominantly, a soft rose gold (#EFA6A0) is used for the metal framework, giving the piece a warm and premium appeal. This rose hue beautifully complements the light pink enamel accent (#F8C8D0), shaped like a tulip bud, adding femininity and grace. The brilliance of sparkling white stones (#FFFFFF) offers a high-contrast shine that draws attention while balancing the softer tones. Clear and sharply cut crystals reflect ambient light, blending effortlessly with the rose gold base, yet standing out due to high luminance. These colors harmonize well for a soft, classy banner.
